Synthesis Method: Induction furnace melting at 1300 °C under argon, cast in a zirconium dioxide crucible and cooled in furnace.; as-cast ingot (contact with copper mold)
Key Findings: Elastic modulus ~198 GPa (163–229 GPa) measured by compression tests; Compression DIC recorded 282 MPa stress at 1.33 % strain and failure at 668 MPa.; Elastic modulus measured ~198 GPa (range 186–215 GPa) from compression tests; Mean indentation elastic modulus = 294 ± 60 GPa (domains 265–384 GPa, hardness 9.2–25.4 GPa).
Comments: Mn addition improves kinetics and reduces defects; DIC used black speckle dots ~0.152 mm in size.; Alloy shows strong microscale heterogeneity in elastic modulus and hardness; Elastic heterogeneity linked to microstructural domains.
